CustomField.formula:
If ( AND( ISNULL ( Addl_Discount_Percent__c ) ,ISNULL (Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c) ),
(Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c*PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c) ,
If (AND ( ISNULL (Addl_Discount_Percent__c ),NOT( ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c ))),
(Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c*PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c) ,
If( AND(NOT(ISNULL( Addl_Discount_Percent__c )),ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c )),
((Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c *((100 - Addl_Discount_Percent__c )/100))*PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c),
If( AND(NOT(ISNULL( Addl_Discount_Percent__c )),NOT(ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c ))),
(Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c *((100 - Addl_Discount_Percent__c)/100))*PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c,
NULL))))
CustomField.label: Net Unit Price
